tool_description: An API showing domain suggestions AVAILABLE in Indonesia for .com and .net extensions.
name: Indonesian Domain Name Suggestion Available
title: Indonesian Domain Name Suggestion Available

api_list.name: Get 5 Indonesia Domain Suggestion
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back 5 domain suggestion, available status and prices in IDR

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: fill this parameter with mandatory value of domain keyword, for example \"data\", \"online\", \"internet\", etc

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: fill this parameter with mandatory value \"suggestdomain\"
